description: Oral contract for services (not land or goods)
facts: George orally agreed to provide consulting services to Helen's company
The contract was for 6 months of work at $10,000 per month
George has already completed 2 months of work
asp_facts: contract(c4). subject_matter(c4, services). parties(c4, george, helen). duration_months(c4, 6). has_writing(c4, no). has_consideration(c4, yes). has_mutual_assent(c4, yes). partially_performed(c4, yes).
question: Is this contract enforceable under the Statute of Frauds?
rationale: Service contracts that can be performed within one year do not fall under the Statute of Frauds writing requirement. Additionally, partial performance supports enforceability.
